div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1398 Karaman (anc. Laranda), Lycaonia, 1969 Burial: c. 300 B.C. Contents: 49 AR Alexander III: 42 lifetime and early post. tetradr. (Amphipolis 2, Pella 1, Sicyon 1, Miletus 1, Side 2, Tarsus 2, Aradus 1, Byblus 1, Carrhae 1, Babylon 29, Susa 1) Philip III: 7 tetradr. (Sidon 1, Babylon 6) Disposition: dispersed Pfeiler, SM 1971, pp. 5-13, illus. The Sicyon coin belongs to a series dated by Noe (Sicyon) to the years 303- 301 B.C.
